article.title: CSC Wins U.S. Army Logistics Modernization Contracts
article.author: Henry Kenyon
article.text: The U.S. Army Materiel Command has issued CSC two contract modifications with a combined value of $261 million to continue providing information technology and logistics services under the Army's Logistics Modernization Program contract. Under the terms of the first modification, CSC will support the sustainment of the modernized system, and on the other, the company will provide services for future deployment and implementation activities.
